column4: Today we remember Ofc. David Sherrard, badge #1078. On Feb 7, 2018, Ofc. Sherrard was shot and killed in the line of duty, responding to a disturbance call. Ofc. Sherrard and his family will always be in our thoughts and he will never be forgotten for his courage and sacrifice.
